attributes.action: Have government departments publish regular phone numbers alongside 0845 numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The enforced use of 0845 numbers to contact government departments (with long hold times) is another tax on the public. Many people subscribe to telephone payment schemes where standard numbers are included in a set charge, they should not have to pay premium 0845 rates. Both 0845 and standard 01XX etc numbers should be published alongside each other.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
